alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 03 at 8:50AM MST until February 05 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow may cause reductions in visibility and possibly partial lane blockages in the usual problem areas susceptible to significant drifting .
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
